raw_comment: i notice the newer generations think that the world is improving. on the other hand, the older people think otherwise simply for the reason that times have changed since they grew up and it hasn't necessarily how they envisioned the world to turn out which can be disappointing leading them to believe the world is getting worse. i wonder about how the graph may have looked into the future or more not the past and why. idk headline
ace_sentences: Some people are members of newer generations.
Some people are members of older generations.
Many members of newer generations think that the world is improving.
Many members of older generations think that the world is not improving.
Times have changed since older people grew up.
The world has not necessarily turned out as older people envisioned.
This situation can disappoint older people.
If older people are disappointed, then older people can believe that the world is getting worse.
I wonder how the graph may look in the future.
I wonder why the graph may look like that in the future.
